thread.title: Hillary Clinton to speak at Wellesley College commencement in May
thread.title_full: Hillary Clinton to speak at Wellesley College commencement in May

author: Greg Ryan
title: Hillary Clinton to speak at Wellesley College commencement in May
text: Hillary Clinton to speak at Wellesley College commencement in May Feb 1, 2017, 10:05am EST Updated Feb 1, 2017, 10:07am EST Industries & Tags Greg Ryan Law and Money Reporter Boston Business Journal Share Hillary Clinton will speak at Wellesley College in May. W. Marc Bernsau Former U.S. Secretary of State and presidential candidate Hillary Clinton will serve as the commencement speaker at her alma mater, Wellesley College, this spring, a school spokesman said. Clinton graduated from the local womenâ€™s liberal arts college in 1969. Her speech on May 26 will come nearly a half-century after her famous address to her fellow graduating seniors, the first time a student had ever spoken at commencement. Hillary Clinton will speak at Wellesley College in May. W. Marc Bernsau The former First Lady was active on campus during her time at Wellesley, including serving as head of the Young Republicans Club there before she became a Democrat. A political science major, she served as president of the College Government Association and graduated with high honors. Clinton lost the presidential election to Donald Trump in November. She served as secretary of state under President Barack Obama for four years, and prior to that was a U.S. senator representing New York state. Greg Ryan covers finance, professional services firms and public policy. Industries
